name: stpatrick-tfs-build-tasks-mql5-compile
description: Compile MQL5 (MetaTrader 5) code on your build server. Only supported on agents hosted in MS Windows
author: Philip Patrick

inputs.name: pathToSources
inputs.label: Sources
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to source or project file.

inputs.name: mql5IncludePath
inputs.label: MQL5 Include Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to MQL5 include files. Leave empty to use those coming with this task.

inputs.name: metaEditorPath
inputs.label: Path to metaeditor64.exe
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to metaeditor64.exe. If left blank, it will be automatically downloaded from external site.
